text: ITBP is proud to be the part of world’s #LargestVaccineDrive by the nation. 20 healthcare personnel of the force are among the first recipients of #COVID19 #vaccine today in Leh, Ladakh @PMOIndia @narendramodi @MoHFW_INDIA @AmitShah @VPSecretariat @rashtrapatibhvn @ITBP_official https://t.co/AlxUtJNhRX
